about.heading: About CareerPath
about.p1: CareerPath is your AI-powered career navigator built for today’s learners and tomorrow’s leaders. Whether you’re a high school student choosing your stream, a college graduate exploring industries, or a professional looking to switch careers — we’re here to guide you.
about.p2: Our team of psychologists, data scientists, and career coaches work to create a personalized and reliable system that combines psychometrics, real-time job market data, and human mentorship to help you make smart choices.
about.p3: We're on a mission to redefine career guidance by making it accessible, data-driven, and aligned with your individuality.

q1.question: 📝 How do I sign up?
q1.answer: Create an account by clicking 'Get Started Free' and filling in your full name, email, and password. You’ll instantly gain access to assessments and tools.

q2.question: 🔐 What if I forget my password?
q2.answer: Go to the login page and click “Forgot Password”. You’ll get a secure link on your email to reset your password quickly.

q3.question: 🧠 What is the Career Assessment Quiz?
q3.answer: A powerful quiz that evaluates your interests, personality, aptitude, and work style to suggest top-fit careers and domains for you.

q4.question: 🗺️ What is a Career Roadmap?
q4.answer: A personalized action plan that includes the skills you need, relevant certifications, learning sources, and steps to land your dream job.

q5.question: 👥 Can I interact with real mentors?
q5.answer: Yes! You can attend mentor sessions, ask questions in webinars, and schedule career calls with experts in your chosen fields.

q6.question: 📱 Is CareerPath available on mobile?
q6.answer: Currently, we’re optimized for web, but a mobile app is under development. You can still access everything through your mobile browser.

privacyPolicy.heading: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.p1: We are committed to safeguarding your data. CareerPath collects limited personal details to enhance your career experience. This includes your email, quiz responses, and profile preferences.
privacyPolicy.p2: Your data is encrypted, never sold, and only used to personalize your experience. You can request to delete your data anytime.
privacyPolicy.p3: We comply with international data privacy laws and never spam your inbox. For questions, reach out to support@careerpath.com.

terms.heading: Terms & Conditions
terms.p1: By signing up, you agree to use CareerPath ethically and only for personal career guidance. Sharing login credentials or reproducing content is prohibited.
terms.p2: CareerPath is not liable for decisions made solely on the platform. Career suggestions are educational in nature and do not guarantee employment.
terms.p3: Your continued use signifies acceptance of updated policies and guidelines.
